name: Story of a Beginning
summary: In the course of their childish bickering, when the three kids set off to see the origin of their village stream, their difference in beliefs give the journey an unexpected and surprising turn.
info:
• 中文名: 源头的故事
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: 故事开始时
  • 上映年度: 2020-07-10(韩国)
  • 片长: 12min
  • 导演: Balaram J
  • 编剧: Balaram J
